caption.p: Effects of adding essential oils from different wormwood species to soybean meal (SBM) ( A) or bermudagrass hay (BGH) ( B) on fold changes of rumen microbial populations compared to that of the blank after 72 h of in vitro incubation in buffered rumen fluid. CON, without essential oil application; GA, Ganghwa essential oil applied; IN, Injin essential oil applied; SA, San essential oil applied. aâ€“c: Means for the same microbe with different letters differ significantly ( p < 0.05).
